mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(drvdate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS 'drvdate', drvclub, FORMAT(lastkm, '#,#') AS 'lastkm', FORMAT(useamt, '#,#') AS 'useamt', drvrem, rependchk FROM tdrive WHERE carno = #{carNo} AND drvclub = #{selectOption} AND drvdate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY drvdate DESC
